page.title: 11CLUBS AT TEVIOTHEAD
page.content: THE{INDOOR CARPET BOWLING CLUB}HAS A MIXED MEMBERSHIP OF 19 FROM THE TEVIOTHEAD DISTRICT. MEETINGS ARE HELD WEEKLY IN TEVIOTHEAD HALL FROM OCTOBER -MARCH. MEMBERS PAY A SUBSCRIPTION OF Â£2.50.COMPETITION MATCHES AND OPEN TOURNAMENTS ARE PLAYED WITH SIMILAR RURAL INDOOR CARPET BOWLING CLUBS. {THE CHURCH WOMEN'S GUILD}IS FORMED FROM MEMBERS OF THE CONGREGATION OF TEVIOTHEAD PARISH CHURCH AND HAS 14 MEMBERS. MEETINGS ARE HELD IN MEMBERS' HOMES ON A ROTA BASIS FROM SEPTEMBER- MARCH AND USUALLY INCLUDE A PRAYER, READING FROM THE BIBLE AND A COLLECTION WHICH IS GIVEN TO CHURCH FUNDS. SYLLABUS INCLUDES TALKS,FILMS, DEMONSTRATIONS,OUTING AND A VISIT AND TALK FROM THE MINISTER. A COMMITTEE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR RUNNING {TEVIOTHEAD HALL}AND MEET PERIODICALLY. LETTING CHARGES Â£5 PLUS ELECTRICITY.
